title: Bug 15899: 'Close All Saved' not functioning consistently
description: The 'Close All Saved' feature is not working reliably in build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
OB: Attempting to close all saved files by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect.
EB: Selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu should close all saved files.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all open editors.
3. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. Ensure that all saved files are closed as expected.
